scripts.text:
UPDATE CHD_INT.DIM_COMPANY_HOUSE
SET COMPANY_HOUSE_ACT_IND='D',
COMPANY_HOUSE_END_DATE=GETDATE()
WHERE COMPANY_HOUSE_BK
IN
(SELECT COMPANY_NUMBER
FROM CHD_STG.COMPANY_HOUSE_DELETIONS)

source.sqlReaderQuery:
Select 
COMPANY_NUMBER COMPANY_HOUSE_BK,
COMPANY_NAME   ,
ADDRESS_LINE_1,
ADDRESS_LINE_2,
COUNTRY,
TOWN,
POSTCODE,
SICCODE_SIC_TEXT_1,
SICCODE_SIC_TEXT_2,
SICCODE_SIC_TEXT_3,
SICCODE_SIC_TEXT_4,
ACCOUNTS_REFDAY,
ACCOUNTS_REFMONTH,
ACCOUNTS_NEXTDUEDATE,
ACCOUNTS_OVERDUE,
  CONVERT (BIGINT, HASHBYTES('SHA1', CONCAT(COMPANY_NUMBER,COMPANY_NAME,ADDRESS_LINE_1,ADDRESS_LINE_2,COUNTRY,TOWN,POSTCODE,SICCODE_SIC_TEXT_1,SICCODE_SIC_TEXT_2,
                                            SICCODE_SIC_TEXT_3,SICCODE_SIC_TEXT_4,ACCOUNTS_REFDAY,ACCOUNTS_REFMONTH,ACCOUNTS_NEXTDUEDATE,ACCOUNTS_OVERDUE))) AS HashId,
GETDATE() COMPANY_HOUSE_START_DATE,
'Y' COMPANY_HOUSE_ACTIVE_IND
from KNE_INT.COMPANY_HOUSE_ADDITIONS
WHERE COMPANY_NUMBER
NOT IN
(SELECT 
COMPANY_HOUSE_BK
FROM KNE_INT.DIM_COMPANY_HOUSE)

typeProperties.notebookPath: /Users/wayne.vaughan@ntu.ac.uk/Advanced Company Search and Data Retrieval API

source.sqlReaderQuery:
WITH
Q_SIC_CODES
AS
(Select COMPANY_NUMBER,
 replace(replace(replace(replace(sic_codes,'[',''),']',''),char(39),''),' ','')  LIST_OF_SIC_CODES,
 CHARINDEX(',', replace(replace(replace(replace(sic_codes,'[',''),']',''),char(39),''),' ',''))  FIRST_SEPERATOR,
CHARINDEX(',', replace(replace(replace(replace(sic_codes,'[',''),']',''),char(39),''),' ',''),CHARINDEX(',', replace(replace(replace(replace(sic_codes,'[',''),']',''),char(39),''),' ',''))+1)   SECOND_SEPERATOR,

CHARINDEX(',', replace(replace(replace(replace(sic_codes,'[',''),']',''),char(39),''),' ',''),CHARINDEX(',', replace(replace(replace(replace(sic_codes,'[',''),']',''),char(39),''),' ',''),CHARINDEX(',',replace(replace(replace(replace(sic_codes,'[',''),']',''),char(39),''),' ',''))+1)+1) THIRD_SEPERATOR
 from [KNE_STG].[COMPANY_HOUSE_ADDITIONS]),

Q_ACCOUNTS
AS
(SELECT  
company_name,
company_number,
substring(accounts,(CHARINDEX(concat(char(39),'day',char(39),':'),accounts) +8 ),2) AS ACCOUNTS_REF_DAY,
substring(accounts,(CHARINDEX(concat(char(39),'month',char(39),':'),accounts) +10 ),2) AS ACCOUNTS_REF_MONTH,
substring(accounts,(CHARINDEX(concat(char(39),'due_on',char(39),':'),accounts) +11 ),10) AS ACCOUNTS_NEXTDUEDATE,
substring(accounts,(CHARINDEX(concat(char(39),'overdue',char(39),':'),accounts) +11 ),5) AS ACCOUNTS_OVERDUE
  FROM [KNE_STG].[COMPANY_HOUSE_ADDITIONS]),

Q_ADDRESS_LIST
AS
( SELECT COMPANY_NUMBER, COMPANY_NAME,registered_office_Address, 
         replace(replace(replace(replace(registered_office_Address,'{',''),'}',''),char(39),''),': ','')  Address_List,
   CASE
 WHEN CHARINDEX('address_line_1',(replace(replace(replace(replace(registered_office_Address,'{',''),'}',''),char(39),''),': ',''))) > 0
 THEN CHARINDEX('address_line_1',(replace(replace(replace(replace(registered_office_Address,'{',''),'}',''),char(39),''),': ',''))) +14
 END START_OF_ADDRESS_1,
 

 CASE
 WHEN CHARINDEX('address_line_1',(replace(replace(replace(replace(registered_office_Address,'{',''),'}',''),char(39),''),': ',''))) > 0
 THEN (CHARINDEX(',',replace(replace(replace(replace(registered_office_Address,'{',''),'}',''),char(39),''),': ',''),CHARINDEX('address_line_1',(replace(replace(replace(replace(registered_office_Address,'{',''),'}',''),char(39),''),': ',''))) +14)) - (CHARINDEX('address_line_1',(replace(replace(replace(replace(registered_office_Address,'{',''),'}',''),char(39),''),': ',''))) +14)
 END LENGTH_OF_ADDRESS_1,
 
 CASE
 WHEN CHARINDEX('address_line_2',(replace(replace(replace(replace(registered_office_Address,'{',''),'}',''),char(39),''),': ',''))) > 0 
 THEN CHARINDEX('address_line_2',(replace(replace(replace(replace(registered_office_Address,'{',''),'}',''),char(39),''),': ',''))) +14 
 END START_OF_ADDRESS_2, 
 
 CASE
 WHEN CHARINDEX('address_line_2',(replace(replace(replace(replace(registered_office_Address,'{',''),'}',''),char(39),''),': ',''))) > 0 
 THEN (CHARINDEX(',',replace(replace(replace(replace(registered_office_Address,'{',''),'}',''),char(39),''),': ',''),CHARINDEX('address_line_2',(replace(replace(replace(replace(registered_office_Address,'{',''),'}',''),char(39),''),': ',''))) +14)) - (CHARINDEX('address_line_2',(replace(replace(replace(replace(registered_office_Address,'{',''),'}',''),char(39),''),': ',''))) +14) 
 END LENGTH_OF_ADDRESS_2,
 

 CASE
 WHEN CHARINDEX('country',(replace(replace(replace(replace(registered_office_Address,'{',''),'}',''),char(39),''),': ',''))) > 0 
 THEN CHARINDEX('country',(replace(replace(replace(replace(registered_office_Address,'{',''),'}',''),char(39),''),': ',''))) +7
 END START_OF_COUNTRY, 

 CASE
 WHEN CHARINDEX('country',(replace(replace(replace(replace(registered_office_Address,'{',''),'}',''),char(39),''),': ',''))) > 0 
 THEN (CHARINDEX(',',replace(replace(replace(replace(registered_office_Address,'{',''),'}',''),char(39),''),': ',''),CHARINDEX('country',(replace(replace(replace(replace(registered_office_Address,'{',''),'}',''),char(39),''),': ',''))) +7)) - (CHARINDEX('country',(replace(replace(replace(replace(registered_office_Address,'{',''),'}',''),char(39),''),': ',''))) +7) 
 END LENGTH_OF_COUNTRY,
 
 
 CASE
 WHEN CHARINDEX('locality',(replace(replace(replace(replace(registered_office_Address,'{',''),'}',''),char(39),''),': ',''))) > 0 
 THEN CHARINDEX('locality',(replace(replace(replace(replace(registered_office_Address,'{',''),'}',''),char(39),''),': ',''))) +8
 END START_OF_LOCALITY, 
 
 CASE
 WHEN CHARINDEX('locality',(replace(replace(replace(replace(registered_office_Address,'{',''),'}',''),char(39),''),': ',''))) > 0 
 THEN (CHARINDEX(',',replace(replace(replace(replace(registered_office_Address,'{',''),'}',''),char(39),''),': ',''),CHARINDEX('locality',(replace(replace(replace(replace(registered_office_Address,'{',''),'}',''),char(39),''),': ',''))) +7)) - (CHARINDEX('locality',(replace(replace(replace(replace(registered_office_Address,'{',''),'}',''),char(39),''),': ',''))) +7) 
 END LENGTH_OF_LOCALITY,
 
 CASE
 WHEN CHARINDEX('postal_code',(replace(replace(replace(replace(registered_office_Address,'{',''),'}',''),char(39),''),': ',''))) > 0 
 THEN CHARINDEX('postal_code',(replace(replace(replace(replace(registered_office_Address,'{',''),'}',''),char(39),''),': ',''))) +11
 END START_OF_POSTCODE, 

 CASE
 WHEN CHARINDEX('postal_code',(replace(replace(replace(replace(registered_office_Address,'{',''),'}',''),char(39),''),': ',''))) > 0 
 THEN 20
 END LENGTH_OF_POSTCODE


 FROM [KNE_STG].[COMPANY_HOUSE_ADDITIONS])



 SELECT  
 Q_ADDRESS_LIST.COMPANY_NUMBER,Q_ADDRESS_LIST.COMPANY_NAME,
 Q_ADDRESS_LIST.Address_List,
 SUBSTRING(Q_ADDRESS_LIST.Address_List,START_OF_ADDRESS_1,LENGTH_OF_ADDRESS_1) ADDRESS_LINE_1,
 SUBSTRING(Q_ADDRESS_LIST.Address_List,START_OF_ADDRESS_2,LENGTH_OF_ADDRESS_2) ADDRESS_LINE_2,
 SUBSTRING(Q_ADDRESS_LIST.Address_List,START_OF_COUNTRY,LENGTH_OF_COUNTRY) COUNTRY,
 SUBSTRING(Q_ADDRESS_LIST.Address_List,START_OF_LOCALITY,LENGTH_OF_LOCALITY) TOWN,
 SUBSTRING(Q_ADDRESS_LIST.Address_List,START_OF_POSTCODE,LENGTH_OF_POSTCODE) POSTCODE,
 SUBSTRING(LIST_OF_SIC_CODES,1,5) SIC_CODE_1,
 CASE
 WHEN FIRST_SEPERATOR > 0
 THEN SUBSTRING(LIST_OF_SIC_CODES,(FIRST_SEPERATOR+1),5)
 END SIC_CODE_2,
 CASE
 WHEN SECOND_SEPERATOR > 0
 THEN SUBSTRING(LIST_OF_SIC_CODES,(SECOND_SEPERATOR+1),5)
 END SIC_CODE_3,
 CASE
 WHEN THIRD_SEPERATOR > 0
 THEN SUBSTRING(LIST_OF_SIC_CODES,(THIRD_SEPERATOR+1),5)
 END SIC_CODE_4,
 ACCOUNTS_REF_DAY,
 ACCOUNTS_REF_MONTH,
 ACCOUNTS_NEXTDUEDATE,
 ACCOUNTS_OVERDUE

 FROM Q_ADDRESS_LIST
 INNER JOIN Q_SIC_CODES
 ON Q_ADDRESS_LIST.COMPANY_NUMBER=Q_SIC_CODES.COMPANY_NUMBER
 INNER JOIN Q_ACCOUNTS
 ON Q_ADDRESS_LIST.COMPANY_NUMBER=Q_ACCOUNTS.COMPANY_NUMBER

WITH
Q_OUPUTS
AS
(
SELECT project_Code, partner,Business_Number,
CASE
WHEN [C1] IS NOT NULL THEN '1'
ELSE '0'
END C1,
CASE
WHEN [C2] IS NOT NULL THEN '1'
ELSE '0'
END C2,
CASE
WHEN [C4] IS NOT NULL THEN '1'
ELSE '0'
END C4,
CASE
WHEN [C6] IS NOT NULL THEN '1'
ELSE '0'
END C6,
CASE
WHEN [C34] IS NOT NULL THEN '1'
ELSE '0'
END C34,
CASE
WHEN [C26] IS NOT NULL THEN '1'
ELSE '0'
END C26,
CASE
WHEN [C28] IS NOT NULL THEN '1'
ELSE '0'
END C28,
CASE
WHEN [C29] IS NOT NULL THEN '1'
ELSE '0'
END C29,
CASE
WHEN [C5] IS NOT NULL THEN '1'
ELSE '0'
END C5,
CASE
WHEN [C8] IS NOT NULL THEN '1'
ELSE '0'
END C8,
CASE
WHEN [C023] IS NOT NULL THEN '1'
ELSE '0'
END C023,
CASE
WHEN [P11] IS NOT NULL THEN '1'
ELSE '0'
END P11,
CASE
WHEN [P13] IS NOT NULL THEN '1'
ELSE '0'
END P13,
CASE
WHEN [R9] IS NOT NULL THEN '1'
ELSE '0'
END R9
FROM (
    SELECT Project_Code, partner,Business_Number,Output FROM [KNE_STG].[Outputs]
) AS SourceTable
PIVOT (
    MAX(output)
    FOR output IN ([C1], [C2], [C4], [C6], [C34], [C26],[C28],[C29],[C5],[C8],[C023],[P11],[P13],[R9] )

) AS PivotTable),





Q_CARBON
AS
(
SELECT BUSINESS_NUMBER,
SUM(CAST("MATCH" AS DECIMAL (10,2))) AS MATCH_TOTAL,
SUM(CASE
WHEN LEN(tCo2e) > 0
THEN CAST(REPLACE(tCo2e,'t','') AS DECIMAL (10,2)) 
ELSE CAST('0.00' AS DECIMAL (10,2))
END) CO2_TOTAL,
SUM(CAST(REPLACE(REPLACE("Grant",'"',''),',','')AS DECIMAL (10,2))) AS  GRANT_TOTAL
FROM KNE_STG.BUSINESSDATA_CARBON
GROUP BY BUSINESS_NUMBER)

  
  
  SELECT 
      MAIN.Project_Code,
      MAIN.Business_Number,
	  CONCAT(MAIN.Project_Code,'|',MAIN.Business_Number) COMPANY_BK,
      MAIN.Business_Name,
      MAIN.Postcode,
      
	  CONVERT(date, MAIN.Enrolment_Date, 103) AS Enrolment_Date,
	  
	
      MAIN.FIVE_Digit_SIC_Code,
      Turnover,
      CAST(MAIN.No_of_Employees AS NUMERIC) AS No_of_Employees,

	  CONVERT(date, MAIN.Business_Registration_Date, 103) AS Business_Registration_Date,
      MAIN.Equality_Policy,
      MAIN.Environmental_Policy,
      MAIN.Size,
      MAIN.Business_No_Type2,
      MAIN.Partner,
	  COALESCE(OUTPUTS.C1,'0') OUTPUT_C1,
	  COALESCE(OUTPUTS.C2,'0') OUTPUT_C2,
	  COALESCE(OUTPUTS.C4,'0') OUTPUT_C4,
	  COALESCE(OUTPUTS.C6,'0') OUTPUT_C6,
	  COALESCE(OUTPUTS.C34,'0') OUTPUT_C34,
      COALESCE(OUTPUTS.C26,'0') OUTPUT_C26,
	  COALESCE(OUTPUTS.C28,'0') OUTPUT_C28,
	  COALESCE(OUTPUTS.C29,'0') OUTPUT_C29,
	  COALESCE(OUTPUTS.C5,'0') OUTPUT_C5,
      COALESCE(OUTPUTS.C8,'0') OUTPUT_C8,
	  COALESCE(OUTPUTS.C023,'0') OUTPUT_C023,
	  COALESCE(OUTPUTS.P11,'0') OUTPUT_P11,
	  COALESCE(OUTPUTS.P13,'0') OUTPUT_P13,
	  COALESCE(OUTPUTS.R9,'0') OUTPUT_R9,
	  COALESCE(Q_CARBON.CO2_TOTAL,'0.00') CO2_TOTAL,
	  COALESCE(Q_CARBON.GRANT_TOTAL,'0.00') GRANT_TOTAL,
	  COALESCE(Q_CARBON.MATCH_TOTAL,'0.00') MATCH_TOTAL
  FROM KNE_STG.BusinessData_General MAIN
  LEFT OUTER JOIN Q_OUPUTS OUTPUTS
  ON MAIN.Project_Code=OUTPUTS.Project_Code
  AND MAIN.Business_Number=OUTPUTS.Business_Number
  AND MAIN.PARTNER=OUTPUTS.Partner
  LEFT OUTER JOIN Q_CARBON
  ON MAIN.Business_Number=Q_CARBON.Business_Number

scripts.text:
UPDATE KNE_INT.DIM_COMPANY_HOUSE
SET COMPANY_HOUSE_ACT_IND='N',
COMPANY_HOUSE_END_DATE=GETDATE()
WHERE COMPANY_HOUSE_BK
IN
(SELECT COMPANY_NUMBER
FROM KNE_STG.COMPANY_HOUSE_DELETIONS)

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
  COMPANY_NUMBER,
  COMPANY_NAME,
  ADDRESS_LINE_1,
  ADDRESS_LINE_2,
  COUNTRY,
  TOWN,
  POSTCODE,
  SICCODE_SIC_TEXT_1,
  SICCODE_SIC_TEXT_2,
  SICCODE_SIC_TEXT_3,
  SICCODE_SIC_TEXT_4,
  ACCOUNTS_REFDAY,
  ACCOUNTS_REFMONTH,
  ACCOUNTS_NEXTDUEDATE,
  ACCOUNTS_OVERDUE,
  'Y' ACTIVE_IND,
  GETDATE() START_DATE,
    CONVERT (BIGINT, HASHBYTES('SHA1', CONCAT(COMPANY_NUMBER,COMPANY_NAME,ADDRESS_LINE_1,ADDRESS_LINE_2,COUNTRY,TOWN,POSTCODE,SICCODE_SIC_TEXT_1,SICCODE_SIC_TEXT_2,SICCODE_SIC_TEXT_3,SICCODE_SIC_TEXT_4,ACCOUNTS_REFDAY,ACCOUNTS_REFMONTH,ACCOUNTS_NEXTDUEDATE,ACCOUNTS_OVERDUE))) AS HashId
  FROM KNE_INT.COMPANY_HOUSE_ADDITIONS
  WHERE COMPANY_NUMBER
  NOT IN 
  (SELECT Company_House_BK
   FROM KNE_INT.DIM_COMPANY_HOUSE)

Select distinct Partner AS PARTNER,
CASE
WHEN Partner='DC'
THEN 'Derby College'
WHEN Partner='NC'
THEN 'Nottingham College'
WHEN Partner='NCC'
THEN 'Nottingham City Council'
WHEN Partner='NTU'
THEN 'Nottingham Trent University'
WHEN Partner='UOD'
THEN 'University of Derby'
END  PARTNER_DESCRIPTION
from kne_stg.Interventions

Select distinct Project AS Project,
CASE
WHEN Project='EI'
THEN 'Enabling Innovation '
WHEN Project='EIC'
THEN 'Enterprise Innovation Centre'
WHEN Project='GRADS'
THEN 'Grads for D2N2'
WHEN Project='PTI'
THEN 'Productivity Through innovation'
WHEN Project='SIE'
THEN 'Sustainability in Enterprise'
WHEN Project='UPS'
THEN 'UpScaler'
WHEN  Project='BH'
THEN 'Big House'
WHEN  COALESCE(Project,'N/A') IS NULL
THEN 'Not Entered'
END  PROJECT_DESCRIPTION
from kne_stg.Interventions
WHERE len(Project) <> 0
UNION
Select DISTINCT Project_Code,
CASE
WHEN Project_Code='EI'
THEN 'Enabling Innovation '
WHEN Project_Code='EIC'
THEN 'Enterprise Innovation Centre'
WHEN Project_Code='GRADS'
THEN 'Grads for D2N2'
WHEN Project_Code='PTI'
THEN 'Productivity Through innovation'
WHEN Project_Code='SIE'
THEN 'Sustainability in Enterprise'
WHEN Project_Code='UPS'
THEN 'UpScaler'
WHEN  Project_Code='BH'
THEN 'Big House'
END  PROJECT_DESCRIPTION
from kne_stg.Placements
WHERE len(Project_Code)<>0 
UNION
Select 'N/A','Not Entered'

WITH
Q_DIM_COMPANY
AS
(SELECT COMPANY_SK,COMPANY_BK
FROM KNE_INT.DIM_COMPANY),

Q_DIM_DATES
AS
(SELECT REP_DATES_SK,REP_DATES_BK
 FROM KNE_INT.DIM_REPORTING_DATES
 WHERE REP_DATES_ACTIVE_IND='Y'),

Q_REPORTING_STRUCUTURE
AS
(SELECT BI_REP_STRUCT_SK, BI_REP_STRUCT_DEPT
 FROM KNE_INT.DIM_REPORTING_STRUCTURE
 WHERE BI_REP_STRUCT_ACTIVE_IND='Y')





SELECT 
RIGHT('000' + FCT.BUSINESS_NUMBER, 8),
Q_DIM_COMPANY.COMPANY_SK FACT_KE_INT_COMP_SK,
Q_DIM_DATES.REP_DATES_SK  FACT_KE_INT_DATE_SK,
Q_REPORTING_STRUCUTURE.BI_REP_STRUCT_SK FACT_KE_INT_REP_STRUCT_SK,
FCT.PROJECT AS FACT_KE_INT_PROJECT,
CASE 
WHEN FCT.PROJECT='EI'
THEN 'Enabling Innovation'
WHEN FCT.PROJECT='EIC'
THEN 'Enterprise and Innovation Centre (DEC)'
WHEN FCT.PROJECT='GRADS'
THEN 'Grads for D2N2 Small to Medium sized businesses'
WHEN FCT.PROJECT='PTI' 
THEN 'Productivity through Innovation'
WHEN FCT.PROJECT='SiE'
THEN 'Sustainability in Enterprise'
WHEN FCT.PROJECT='UPS'
THEN 'Upscaler'
END FACT_KE_INT_PROJECT_DESC,


FCT.PARTNER AS FACT_KE_INT_PARTNER,
FCT.INTERVENTION AS FACT_KE_INT_INTERVENTION,
FCT.INTERVENTION_TYPE AS FACT_KE_INT_INTERVENTION_TYP,
FCT.INTERVENTION_HOURS AS FACT_KE_INT_INTERVENTION_HOURS,

CASE
WHEN LEN(FCT.INTERVENTION_tCO2e)=0
THEN '0'
ELSE FCT.INTERVENTION_tCO2e 
END FACT_KE_INT_INTERVENTION_CO2


FROM KNE_STG.Interventions FCT
INNER JOIN Q_DIM_COMPANY
ON CONCAT(FCT.Project ,'|',RIGHT('000' + FCT.BUSINESS_NUMBER, 8))=Q_DIM_COMPANY.COMPANY_BK
INNER JOIN Q_DIM_DATES
ON CASE
WHEN FCT.INTERVENTION_DATE = '0' THEN 'N/A'
WHEN FCT.INTERVENTION_DATE IS NULL THEN 'N/A'
ELSE CONVERT(VARCHAR, CAST(FCT.INTERVENTION_DATE AS DATE), 103)
END=Q_DIM_DATES.REP_DATES_BK
INNER JOIN Q_REPORTING_STRUCUTURE
ON CASE
WHEN FCT.SCHOOL_DEBT = 'ADBE' THEN 'ENV'
WHEN FCT.SCHOOL_DEBT = 'Art & Design' THEN 'ART'
WHEN FCT.SCHOOL_DEBT = 'Employability' THEN 'EMP'
WHEN FCT.SCHOOL_DEBT LIKE '%EMP%' THEN 'EMP'
WHEN FCT.SCHOOL_DEBT LIKE '%APP%' THEN 'APP'
WHEN FCT.SCHOOL_DEBT LIKE '%SST%' THEN 'SST'
WHEN FCT.SCHOOL_DEBT = 'SS' THEN 'SOC'
WHEN FCT.SCHOOL_DEBT = 'Estates' THEN 'EST'
WHEN FCT.SCHOOL_DEBT = 'NBS' THEN 'NBS'
WHEN FCT.SCHOOL_DEBT = '0' THEN 'DEPT N/A'
WHEN FCT.SCHOOL_DEBT = 'DEC' THEN 'DEPT N/A'
WHEN LEN(FCT.SCHOOL_DEBT) =0 THEN 'DEPT N/A'
END=Q_REPORTING_STRUCUTURE.BI_REP_STRUCT_DEPT

WITH
Q_DIM_COMPANY
AS
(SELECT COMPANY_SK,COMPANY_BK
FROM KNE_INT.DIM_COMPANY),

Q_DIM_DATES
AS
(SELECT REP_DATES_SK,REP_DATES_BK
 FROM KNE_INT.DIM_REPORTING_DATES
 WHERE REP_DATES_ACTIVE_IND='Y'),

Q_DIM_PARTNER
AS
(SELECT PARTNER_SK,PARTNER_BK
 FROM KNE_INT.DIM_PARTNER),

Q_DIM_PROJECT
AS
(SELECT PROJECT_SK,PROJECT_BK
 FROM KNE_INT.DIM_PROJECT)

SELECT 
Q_DIM_COMPANY.COMPANY_SK FACT_KE_PLACE_COMP_SK, 
Q_DIM_DATES.REP_DATES_SK  FACT_KE_PLACE_DATE_SK,
Q_DIM_PARTNER.PARTNER_SK  FACT_KE_PLACE_PARTNER_SK,
Q_DIM_PROJECT.PROJECT_SK  FACT_KE_PLACE_PROJECT_SK,
FCT.PROJECT_CODE AS FACT_KE_PLACE_PROJECT,


CASE 
WHEN FCT.PROJECT_CODE='EI'
THEN 'Enabling Innovation'
WHEN FCT.PROJECT_CODE='EIC'
THEN 'Enterprise and Innovation Centre (DEC)'
WHEN FCT.PROJECT_CODE='GRADS'
THEN 'Grads for D2N2 Small to Medium sized businesses'
WHEN FCT.PROJECT_CODE='PTI' 
THEN 'Productivity through Innovation'
WHEN FCT.PROJECT_CODE='SiE'
THEN 'Sustainability in Enterprise'
WHEN FCT.PROJECT_CODE='UPS'
THEN 'Upscaler'
END FACT_KE_PLACE_PROJECT_DESC,


FCT.Partner AS FACT_KE_PLACE_PARTNER,
FCT.University AS FACT_KE_PLACE_UNIVERSITY,
FCT.INTERVENTION AS FACT_KE_PLACE_INTERVENTION,
FCT.ROLE AS FACT_KE_PLACE_ROLE,
FCT.Degree AS FACT_KE_PLACE_DEGREE,
FCT.Year_Graduated AS FACT_KE_PLACE_GRAD_YEAR,
CASE
WHEN LEN(FCT.No_of_Placements)=0
THEN '0.00'
ELSE CAST(FCT.No_of_Placements AS DECIMAL(6)) 
END FACT_KE_PLACE_NO_OF_PLACE,

CASE
WHEN LEN(FCT.Length_Weeks)=0
THEN '0.00'
ELSE CAST(FCT.Length_Weeks AS DECIMAL(6)) 
END FACT_KE_PLACE_NO_OF_WEEKS,

CASE
WHEN LEN(FCT."GRANT")=0
THEN '0.00'
ELSE CAST(FCT."GRANT" AS NUMERIC(10,2)) 
END FACT_KE_PLACE_GRANT,


CASE
WHEN LEN(FCT.Salary)=0
THEN '0.00'
ELSE CAST(FCT.Salary AS NUMERIC(10,2))
END FACT_KE_PLACE_SALARY,

CAST(
CASE
WHEN LEN("Match")=0
THEN '0.00'
ELSE
FCT."Match" 
END
AS NUMERIC(10,2))  AS FACT_KE_PLACE_MATCH
FROM KNE_STG.PLACEMENTS FCT
INNER JOIN Q_DIM_COMPANY
ON CONCAT(FCT.Project_Code,'|',FCT.BUSINESS_NUMBER)=Q_DIM_COMPANY.COMPANY_BK
INNER JOIN Q_DIM_PARTNER
ON FCT.Partner=Q_DIM_PARTNER.PARTNER_BK
INNER JOIN Q_DIM_PROJECT
ON 
CASE 
WHEN LEN(FCT.Project_Code)= 0
THEN 'N/A'
ELSE FCT.Project_Code
END =Q_DIM_PROJECT.PROJECT_BK
INNER JOIN Q_DIM_DATES
ON CASE
WHEN FCT.QTR = '0' THEN 'N/A'
WHEN FCT.QTR IS NULL THEN 'N/A'
ELSE FCT.QTR
END=Q_DIM_DATES.REP_DATES_BK

scripts.text:
UPDATE  KNE_STG.BusinessData_General
SET  Business_Number= RIGHT(REPLICATE('0', 8) + Business_Number, 8)  
WHERE  len(Business_Number) < 8

UPDATE  KNE_STG.Placements
SET  Business_Number= RIGHT(REPLICATE('0', 8) + Business_Number, 8)  
WHERE  len(Business_Number) < 8

source.sqlReaderQuery:
WITH
Q_INT_HEALTH_BOARD
AS
( Select DISTINCT SICBL23CD,ICB23NM NHS_INTEGRATED_CARE_BOARD,NHSER23NM NHS_REGION
 from KNE_STG.POSTCODE_INTEGRATED_HEALTH_BOARD),


Q_PARL_CONT
AS
(  SELECT DISTINCT PC.PCD POSTCODE,
 COALESCE(CONDESC24.PCON24NM,CONDESC.PCON10NM) ACTIVE_CONSTITUENCY
 FROM KNE_STG.POSTCODES PC
 LEFT OUTER JOIN KNE_STG.POSTCODE_CONSTITUENCIES CONDESC
 ON PC.PCON=CONDESC.PCON10CD
 LEFT OUTER JOIN KNE_STG.POSTCODE_PARL_CONSTIT_2024 CON24
 ON REPLACE(PC.pcd,' ','')=REPLACE(CON24.POSTCODE,' ','')
 LEFT OUTER JOIN KNE_STG.POSTCODE_CONSTITUENCIES CONDESC24
 ON CON24.PCON24=CONDESC24.PCON24CD
 AND PC.PCON=CONDESC24.PCON10CD
 )





SELECT  DISTINCT 
PC.PCD AS POSTCODE,
WD.WD21NM AS WARDNAME,
LA.LAD22NM AS LOCAL_AUTHORITY,
CS.ACTIVE_CONSTITUENCY AS PARL_CONSTIT,
CTY.CTY15NM AS COUNTY,
RG.RGN14NM AS REGION,
COUNTRY.CTRY15NM COUNTRY,
HB.NHS_INTEGRATED_CARE_BOARD,
HB.NHS_REGION,
CCG.CCG18NM NHS_CLINICAL_COMM_GROUP,
COALESCE(NP.NPARK16NM, 'Not a National Park') AS NATIONAL_PARK,
PO.PFA15NM POLICE_AUTHORITY,
TTW."Employment rate" AS EMPLOYMENT_RATE,
TTW."Male Employment Rate" AS MALE_EMPLOYMENT_RATE,
TTW."Female Employment Rate" AS FEMALE_EMPLOYMENT_RATE,
TTW."Self Employment Rate" AS SELF_EMPLOYMENT_RATE,
TTW."Economically inactive" AS ECON_INACTIVE_RATE,
TTW."Economically inactive males" AS MALE_ECON_INACTIVE_RATE,
TTW."Economically inactive females" AS FEMALE_ECON_INACTIVE_RATE,
TTW."NVQ Level 4 qualifications" AS NVQ_LVL4_QUALS,
TTW."NVQ no qualifications" AS NVQ_NO_QUALS,
PC.LAT   AS LATITUDE,
PC.LONG AS LONGDITUDE

 
 FROM KNE_STG.Postcodes PC
 LEFT OUTER JOIN KNE_STG.POSTCODE_COUNTRY COUNTRY
 ON PC.CTRY=COUNTRY.CTRY15CD
LEFT OUTER JOIN KNE_STG.POSTCODE_LOCAL_AUTHORITY LA
 ON PC.LAUA=LA.LAD22CD
 LEFT OUTER JOIN KNE_STG.POSTCODE_WARDS WD
 ON PC.WARD=WD.WD21CD
 LEFT OUTER JOIN KNE_STG.POSTCODE_REGIONS RG
  ON PC.RGN=RG.RGN14CD 
 LEFT OUTER JOIN KNE_STG.POSTCODE_COUNTIES CTY
 ON PC.CTY=CTY.CTY15CD
 LEFT OUTER JOIN Q_PARL_CONT CS
 ON PC.PCD=CS.POSTCODE
 LEFT OUTER JOIN KNE_STG.POSTCODE_NATIONAL_PARK NP
 ON PC.NPARK=NP.NPARK16CD
 LEFT OUTER JOIN KNE_STG.POSTCODE_POLICE PO
 ON PC.PFA=PO.PFA15CD
 LEFT OUTER JOIN KNE_STG.POSTCODE_TRAVEL_TO_WORK TTW
 ON PC.TTWA=TTW.TTWA11CDN
 LEFT OUTER JOIN Q_INT_HEALTH_BOARD HB
 ON PC.SICBL=HB.SICBL23CD
 LEFT OUTER JOIN KNE_STG.POSTCODE_NHS_CCG CCG
 ON PC.LSOA21=CCG.LSOA11CD
